name: Scripture Golf
tagline: A classic LDS Sunday School game of scripture trivia
body:
Scripture Golf is a classic LDS Sunday School game. It is a game of scripture trivia.

While every effort has been made to make this app bug-free, if you encounter any bugs or have any suggestions for future versions, please email woodruffapps@gmail.com and I will do my best to implement your ideas! This app will continue to be supported through adding more scriptures, making changes to the app to improve performance, and adding new features.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
